attributes.action: Make Greggs formally endorse the Facebook page "Greggs Talk UK/EU"
attributes.background: The Greggs Talk UK/EU page has existed for a few months now; from humble beginnings, a small community of pastry lovers decided that they were stronger in numbers and took to Facebook to spread the good word. Formal endorsement from Greggs is not only necessary but fair - http://tinyurl.com/jslrsw2
